description: Quattro`s Dewott participated in the Scallsword King Playoffs tournament on Hotachi Island. It lost to Ash`s Oshawott in the final round of the tournament. Realizing that she wouldn`t be with Quattro`s Dewott, Mijuka jumped off the stage to be with him. This caused Ash`s Oshawott Scallsword to break and according to the rules of the tournament, it was stripped of the title of king and Quattro`s Dewott became the king.
name: Futachimaru (Quattro)
